title: Wall Facing, ca. 1725
dimensions: Overall: H: 165.1 x W: 168.9 cm (5 ft. 5 in. x 5 ft. 6 1/2 in.)
description: Upright rectangular panel of tiles; dark purple (manganese) on white ground showing flower-filled urn on pedestal flanked by two nude female figures with exotic birds, in landscape background; at sides,  twisted columns entwined and pendented with floral garlands, crested with winged cherub-heads.

tombstone.epitaph:
Wall Facing, ca. 1725.
ca. 1725. Tin-glazed earthenware, underglaze. Gift of William Randolph Hearst. 1926-43-2-145.
